Label.en: Let me tell you a story about Hopeless Harvey...
Label.fr: Let me tell you a story about Hopeless Harvey...
Label.es: Let me tell you a story about Hopeless Harvey...

Label.en: He was a stand up guy, but our friendship was cut short far too early…
Label.fr: He was a stand up guy, but our friendship was cut short far too early…
Label.es: He was a stand up guy, but our friendship was cut short far too early…

Label.en: He knew he needed to get resources... but was pretty terrible at doing it
Label.fr: He knew he needed to get resources... but was pretty terrible at doing it
Label.es: He knew he needed to get resources... but was pretty terrible at doing it

Label.en: For some reason he kept bashing away at junk!
Label.fr: For some reason he kept bashing away at junk!
Label.es: For some reason he kept bashing away at junk!

Label.en: I don’t understand why he didn’t just go for this stuff, as it would’ve given him much more!
Label.fr: I don’t understand why he didn’t just go for this stuff, as it would’ve given him much more!
Label.es: I don’t understand why he didn’t just go for this stuff, as it would’ve given him much more!

Label.en: You’re already doing better than Harvey, then!
Label.fr: You’re already doing better than Harvey, then!
Label.es: You’re already doing better than Harvey, then!
